title: Ram Kumar Sharma vs. ABC Bank Ltd.
summary: The court ruled in favor of the complainant regarding unauthorized loan processing charges. The bank was ordered to refund the excess charges with interest.

title: State vs. Gopal Singh Thakuri
summary: The defendant was found guilty of fraud and sentenced to 3 years imprisonment with a fine of NPR 500,000.

title: Sita Sharma vs. Kathmandu Metropolitan City
summary: Court directed the metropolitan city to reconsider the property tax assessment within 60 days. The original assessment was found to be arbitrary and without proper justification.

title: Workers Union vs. XYZ Manufacturing Pvt. Ltd.
summary: The company was ordered to reinstate 15 workers who were terminated without following due process. Compensation for lost wages was also awarded.

title: Laxmi Devi Poudel vs. Nepal Telecom
summary: Nepal Telecom was found liable for service interruption and ordered to compensate the complainant for business losses caused by prolonged internet outage.
